attributes.review: It was Tuesday, I had just woken up and I thought to myself what could i do today to help make America great again, and then it hit me, I should download this app so I could keep up with what my orange god was doing. To start things off the app took a month to download even though I had perfect WiFi, and to top things off while it was downloading it kept playing all of Donald Trumps speeches on repeat till my ears bled. This sound soon attracted the evil Trump supporting rats. They infested my house and kept chanting ‚ÄúTrump 2020‚Äù while carrying knives. They drop kicked me to the ground and held a knife to my neck and told me if I didn‚Äôt vote for Trump they would come back and kill me. I tried calling the police but they were too busy killing innocent black people to help me. After the app was dowloaded my phone started glitching, and all of a sudden my phone was taken over by the orange man himself. I was so angry that he took over my phone and took away my access to TikTok that I told the rats I rather die than vote for him. They didn‚Äôt like this so instead they kidnapped me and my whole family and made us eat baby meat. After holding us hostage for 3 days they murdered my family in cold blood, however I was able to escape with the help from the Bernie supporting cockroaches. I barely made it out alive though when one of the rats saw me. I thought I was a goner, until my cockroach friend, pablo stepped in front of me to distract the evil rat. They dueled to the death while i made my escape. Sadly, Pablo didn‚Äôt survive the fight, but he lives on in my heart. I warn you all, if you want to keep your family safe, DO NOT download this app!
